artist: Utagawa Kuniyoshi Published by Ebiya Rinnosuke
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: center and left sheets of a vertical ōban triptych
dimension: 14 3/8 × 9 5/8 in. (36.5 × 24.5 cm) (image, sheet, vertical ōban) each sheet
marks: on each sheet: 一勇斎国芳画 {Ichiyūsai Kuniyoshi ga}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: The Actors Fujikawa Hanatomo III as Onoe [right], Nakayama Bungorō II as Nakayama [center], and Bandō Shuka I as Ochiyo, Iwafuji's Servant [left]
